name: Confluence
description: This app supports a variety of actions for content generation in Confluence

actions.description: Create a page in the space

space_key.description: Name of the space to create the page
Name of the space containing the page

example_values:
Welcome to your new space!

Confluence spaces are great for sharing content and news with your team. This is your home page. Right now it shows recent space activity, but you can customize this page in any way you like.

Complete these tasks to get started

1 incomplete Edit this home page - Click Edit in the top right of this screen to customize your Space home page 2 incomplete Create your first page - Click the Create button in the header to get started 3 incomplete Brand your Space - Click Configure Sidebar in the left panel to update space details and logo 4 incomplete Set permissions - Click Space Tools in the left sidebar to update permissions and give others access
